title: Binomial Calculations: Tossing a Fair Coin
question_text:
Suppose a fair coin is tossed $8\text{ times}$, and only $2$ of those $\text{tosses}$ were heads.
Use binomial calculations to determine the probability of $2$ or fewer heads out of $8\text{ tosses}$, and determine if this gives appropriate evidence to suggest that the coin is unfair.
